channel.title: How do I add a toolbar?
channel.description:
Hey guys i was wondering.. how can I add a toolbar at the top of the client that like says forums and vote and when you click them it takes you there? Like..
How would I get something like this [IMG]http://C:\Users\dad\Desktop\before.png[/img]
Look like this: [IMG]http://C:\Users\dad\Desktop\after.png[/img]
Sorry if you can't see the pictures idk how to make them any bigger.. also can someone tell me how to do that too? xD
